description.value:
A user that possesses this tome gains +20 to Common Lore (Ecclesiarchy, Imperial Creed), and Scholastic Lore (Imperial Creed) Tests.

Requirements

Also known as the "Book of Hours" by Sebastian Thore, containing many prayers, liturgies, sermons, and a calender of feast days.

Effect: Average

Notes: -
description.summary: A user that possesses this tome gains +20 to Common Lore (Ecclesiarchy, Imperial Creed), and Scholastic Lore (Imperial Creed) Tests.
